description: Developed AI-driven blockchain rewards system on Bitcoin Runes and implemented staking logic for BACON tokens, boosting engagement by 35%.
Enhanced Caravan multisig with BC-UR 2.0 animated QR signing support and PSBT signature tracking, reducing signing friction by 60%.
Designed and built full-stack mobile application using Flutter, boosting engagement by 20% and improving backend response time by 15%.
Upgraded Kurento-based video conferencing system serving 200+ users and deployed scalable microservices on AWS/GCP.
